comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: Sitting dead center in this pic is Elihu Root, who was a trust friend of Teddy Roosevelt. Also Sec. or War under Pres. McKinley & Roosevelt and Sec. of State during TR's second administration. Won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1912. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elihu_Root

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: If you search for Root and Guthrie, you find this citation, from NYTimes, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9501E4D6123BEE32A... and here is an interesting article about Guthrie in SARATOGA (many pictures of that here), when he was presiding over the Republican State Convention in 1912 (and lambasting TR and the Progressives). query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9A04EFD6123CE6...
